name: Patchless
description:
Download the desktop version for better performance!! Patchless is a platformer, but in each level the mechanic required to complete it is missing. You will be able to unlock the required mechanic, but that will also block another important one.(I know it's confusing, just play and you will understand.)         Controls -WASD/Arrow Keys to move -Space/Enter to shoot -R to restart -ESC/P to pause        Credits -Art by VEXXED -Font & Music by HeartBeast -Sounds by Jonas Tyroller -You for playing ❤️.         Tools Used -Godot game engine -Krita, for making the icon
A submission to GodotWildJam #31. Theme: Something is missing
